Text: I love how this is an "unrated version" but "fuck" is pronounced "frack" in the movie. Never will I read a title and expect it to be 100% exactly what it says to be.
Dohiety - Frack is how they say Fuck in BSG. Always has been.

It ' s the same as the small 10 episodes of last year!
Nice try.
Awaiting the real tv series.
:-)

There is no "real" TV series.

BSG Blood & Chrome was a series of YouTube and Machinima shorts originally aired online and then compiled into a single 90min film which aired on broadcast TV.

There are currently no plans announced to make any more episode / films.

This is all the BSG Blood & Chrome there is or will be.

Thanks YIFY!
